A different point of view....
Monster Rancher Metropolis: Monster Rancher 3 Archive (PS2): Locales: A different point of view....
By Corpse on Thursday, February 28, 2002 - 04:11 pm:

Of ventures, that is. I found this out earlier this morning when I was doing the venture-only method. Hold the R2 button down during the venture, and you get a different camera angle of the venture. A bit of warning however; this angle gives a complete view of the entire region that you're in, but it can be kinda difficult to see your monster if it's something small like a Pixie or a Momo.

By Wild Garuda on Friday, March 1, 2002 - 07:13 pm:
